I have started playing KSP But i think i am the biggest noob .

JST wanna ask if the in game tutorials are good or should i see some stuff on youtube . If any please give the links ... I DNT know i was first checking myself in the one old version i torrented but in that the tutorials sucks Please help !!!

I played around with the tutorials when I started in 0.23. Yes, I'd say that's a good place to start, as it'll give you some of the basics of just how to do things in the game. For any more advanced concepts, definitely check out youtube as well. Scott Manley in particular has a lot of great tutorials in the game, and while many were made in earlier versions of the game, what he shows still applies. Several other folks have made video tutorials that are quite good as well.
Watch these by Scott Manley and you'll learn your basics!
